subject: Meeting request: Project sync
body: Hi, can we meet tomorrow to discuss the project milestones? Please share agenda.

draft.subject: Re: Meeting request: Project sync
draft.body:
Subject: Re: Meeting request: Project sync
From: [Your Name]
To: [Sender's Name]

Dear [Sender's Name],

Thank you for reaching out. I'd be happy to discuss the project milestones. Before we schedule a meeting, could you please share more details about the topics you'd like to cover and what you're hoping to achieve from our discussion? I'd also like to confirm if you'd prefer a call or in-person meeting.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

action_items.raw:
I don't see any action items in the email. 

So, the array would be:

[]

draft.subject: Re: Weekly Tech Roundup
draft.body:
Since there is no sender's name, I'll draft a polite reply without a greeting or signature.

Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for sending over this week's tech highlights. I'd love to catch up on the latest news and trends. Unfortunately, your email appears to be truncated. Could you please share a brief summary or provide a link to access the full round-up?

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
